text: Hanns Kerrl (11 December 1887 in Wolfsburg - 12 December 1941 in Berlin) was a German politician. He was a minister of church affairs. He was also a member of the Cabinet Hitler. Category:1887 births Category:1941 deaths Category:German military personnel of World War I Category:Government ministers of Nazi Germany Category:Members of the Reichstag (Nazi Germany) Category:Politicians from Lower Saxony Category:Politicians of the Nazi Party Category:Prussian politicians Category:Weimar Republic politicians
title: Hanns Kerrl
